import React from 'react'; import link from 'react-router-dom'; const AboutSection = () => { return (

About Us

Pack for CampTM is a family-run online store that offers everything you need for summer camp under one roof. We sell all the items you expect to find on a camp packing list: soft trunks, name labels, clip-on fans, bedding, laundry accessories, toiletries, storage solutions and more. We also offer logowear to families from our partner camps. One of the unique features of the website is the smart packing list option where you can purchase your entire camp packing list in one click, saving you lots of time. Alternatively, you can browse the various collections and choose items at your leisure. We pride ourselves on high quality goods and competitive fair prices while giving camp parents a seamless and hassle-free shopping experience. We offer free shipping in the US (48 contiguous states) on orders over $150. Our Story We’re Gaby Fachler and Melissa Goldwag, husband and wife team, and founders and owners of Pack for Camp. A good part of our youth was spent around the campfire and we still love everything about summer camp! Melissa enjoyed many summers as a camper, camp counselor and lifeguard while Gaby spent his summers as a camper, counselor and head counselor. We have a long family tradition of selling gear for kids going to summer camp. Melissa's parents, "Murray the Sockman" and Meryl have been running the store "Kosher Socks" for the past 40 years, a “one-stop shop” for everything you need for summer camp. Located in South Fallsburg, NY, the store is still a hub of activity every summer. Murray and Meryl also pioneered the “camp sale” model, in which they partnered with schools in the greater NY area and sold camp products on-location, with a percentage of sales going to the school. Murray always dreamed of taking the store online and bringing the “one-stop shop” camp model to a wider audience. In 2017, we realized that dream and launched the online store, Pack for Camp, revolutionizing the way parents shop for camp. We know how difficult and time consuming it can be to fill your camp packing list. We use our experience from the store combined with modern technological innovations to make your shopping experience as quick, easy, and enjoyable as possible. We live in Modiin, Israel with our 4 children. Our warehouse and operations are located in Reading, PA. Partnership program Pack for Camp partners with summer camps across the US to offer campers everything they need for summer camp under one roof. We create uniquely customized smart packing lists and build exclusive logo wear stores for our partner camps. Read more about our partnership program Customer testimonials "It was really so easy to find what I needed on the Pack for Camp website. I ordered clothing labels for my children for camp, they seem like great quality and they stayed on perfectly in the laundry. I was able to find all sorts of odds and ends that my children need for camp on their website. I got my order really fast. The customer service is amazing, they answer emails right away and are very helpful. I definitely will be ordering again from them." Chumi Rubin "We received our order today and were very, very, pleased!...When I think of all the price shopping I did on other items I had already bought, It would have been so much more pleasant to simply order it all from you and still feel good about the prices. Thanks again for everything." Arline Pelton "The website is so easy to navigate. They have very reasonable prices and makes shopping for camp so much easier. Great customer service, should you need it for anything. Been a fantastic experience. Thank you pack for camp!" Sarah Plaut "I just ordered my camp stuff from packforcamp online. It was such a great experience. Easy site to use, great customer service, a pleasure to work with! I highly recommend it!! " Chanie Rosenberg "I saw Pack for Camp on my cousins feed. I am so happy that I did! The quality of the bags is unmatched! The sizes are perfect and the customer service is over the top amazing. I am thrilled that I accidentally stumbled upon them!!." Stacey Erlich Rockman Affiliate Store Our affiliate store is located at: Kosher Socks Main Street South Fallsburg, NY Tel: (845) 898-1943 (summer only) The store is open during the summer months. Sister site - Pack for Israel After launching Pack for Camp, we quickly discovered that many of our customers were also buying items for their kids going on GAP year programs to Israel but they were finding it difficult to fit everything into the limited space in their luggage and to find appliances and bedding compatible to Israeli standards. Enter Pack for Israel... an online store that provides all your dorm needs for your GAP year or summer program in Israel: Bedding, towels, toiletries, small appliances (220V), storage accessories & more. Orders are delivered directly to your Israel address, awaiting you on arrival. Visit www.packforisrael.com.
